attributes.action: Ensure angling is not affected by the new lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: To allow adults to pursue a safe pastime during lockdown can only be of benefit to peoples wellbeing
attributes.background: Allow fresh water fishing to continue under lockdown it is solitary! it is safe! and will protect people's predominantly mens mental health

rejection.details:
Under the national lockdown effective from January 6th, angling and fishing are still permitted activities, as long as wider guidance on social distancing and household mixing is adhered to. See Sport England's website for more information:
https://www.sportengland.org/how-we-can-help/coronavirus/return-play/frequently-asked-questions-national-lockdown-restrictions
